text: Alan Igbon (May 29, 1952 â€“ early December 2020) was a British actor. He acted in television series such as The Professionals, Coronation Street and Boys from the Blackstuff. Igbon was born in Hulme, Manchester. Igbon died in December 2020, aged 68. His death was announced a month later. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:Actors from Manchester
